Author: NightmareXIV
Name: Lifestream
Punchline: A plugin to speed up Aethernet travel and World changing.
Description:
- One click to teleport to any world or aethernet destination
- Click on aetheryte shards inside zone map to teleport to them
Changelog:
- Fixed a bug where instance changer overlay would show even when disabled in options
- Fixed an issue where instance changer couldn't be initialized when YesAlready would instantly skip to instance selection
- Added an option to disable Sprint and Peloton usage on movement commands
- Added an option to choose which game windows will hide Lifestream overlays
- Slightly reworked settings UI
